entry.title: The Sy(stem)s Developmental Biology Lab opens its doors at the CABD

link.title: The Sy(stem)s Developmental Biology Lab opens its doors at the CABD

entry.content: The Sy(stem)s Developmental Biology Lab opens its doors at the CABD! And we discuss the journey in a new post the New PI Diaries organized by The Node.
